name: facebook_bulk_search
description: Search multiple queries on Facebook in parallel using concurrent browser tabs. Use this instead of calling facebook_search multiple times - it is faster and more efficient. Pass all queries as a single comma-separated string. Example: 'AI startups,web development,machine learning'.

parameters.name: queries
parameters.description: Comma-separated search queries (e.g. 'tech news,gaming community,cooking recipes')

detailSteps.code: const results = []; const feedItems = document.querySelectorAll('[role="feed"] > div, [role="article"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(feedItems.length, 5); i++) { const el = feedItems[i]; const linkEls = el.querySelectorAll('a[href]'); let profileLink = ''; let profileName = ''; let snippet = ''; let resultType = 'post'; for (const link of linkEls) { const href = link.getAttribute('href') || ''; if (href.includes('facebook.com/') && !href.includes('/search/') && !href.includes('#') && !href.includes('policies')) { profileLink = href; profileName = link.textContent.trim(); if (href.includes('/groups/')) resultType = 'group'; else if (href.includes('/events/')) resultType = 'event'; else resultType = 'page_or_profile'; break; } } const textEls = el.querySelectorAll('div[dir="auto"], span[dir="auto"]'); for (const t of textEls) { const text = t.textContent.trim(); if (text.length > 20 && text.length < 1000) { snippet = text.substring(0, 200); break; } } if (profileName || snippet) { results.push({ name: profileName, snippet: snippet, type: resultType, url: profileLink }); } } const params = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search); return { query: params.get('q') || '', result_count: results.length, results: results }
detailSteps.name: search_results
detailSteps.label: Extract results
